snippet.title: Napa Cabbage Salad With Mirin Dressing
snippet.description: This is another of Martha's Salads!! So tasty - and the dressing is so good, just a little different flavor -

snippet.title: Spicy Coleslaw
snippet.description: This recipe was featured in our June/July 2009 newsletter and was sampled at our June 2009 Potluck Dinner. It was adapted from the recipe in Greens Glorious...

snippet.title: Tachiyama Chanko-Nabe (Beef and Chicken Hot Pot)
snippet.description: This nabe recipe is from the restaurant Tomoegata, which specializes in chanko nabe (sumo wrestler's stew).

snippet.title: Beef Stew With Onions, Tomatoes, and Mushrooms
snippet.description: From The Orchid at Mauna Lani, Big Island, HI. I've eaten there several times and their food is awesome. Can't wait to give this a try.

snippet.title: Authentic Pineapple Sinigang

snippet.title: Hot & Sour Tom Yum Soup
snippet.description: Light and refreshing savoury soup - perfect accompaniment to Thai curries and best served with hot steamed rice.

snippet.title: Spicy Shredded Root Pickle
snippet.description: This tangy, gingery pickle is wonderful on any sort of sandwich or wrap you care to make (try it on Banh Mi!) - but it also makes a delicious slaw on...
